title: Mounting evidence highlights the importance of Covid-19 boosters
content: As the world learns more about the Omicron coronavirus variant and Delta continues to cause Covid-19 cases to rise around much of the United States, the need for booster shots becomes clearer than ever -- even beyond the growing data about waning vaccine immu…

title: NFL Adds Mask Requirement, Increases Covid Testing
content: After N.F.L. cases more than doubled, the league strengthened its Covid-19 protocols and recommended teams help set up testing for families of players and team staff ahead of the holiday.

title: Covid-19 Boosters for All Are On the Way
content: Federal health officials are expected to sanction covid-19 boosters for most Americans this week—a decision that’s become well-supported by the science. While the original shots still provide plenty of protection, booster doses are clearly restoring or even s…

title: Omicron is Here. Will We Use Our New Covid Drugs Wisely?
content: The world must not repeat history by making Covid-19 drugs inaccessible.

title: Rotterdam police clash with rioters as Covid protest turns violent
content: Several people are injured in Rotterdam as protests against new coronavirus curbs turn violent.

title: How to prepare for another winter of Covid-19? An expert weights in
content: CNN Medical Analyst Dr. Leana Wen shares what vaccines you should get as well as other tips to safe safe from Covid-19 in the coming months.

title: NIH director: New Covid-19 variant 'ought to redouble' vaccination and mitigation efforts
content: The director of the National Institutes of Health stressed Sunday that a newly emerged coronavirus variant "ought to redouble" vaccination efforts and other mitigation strategies, saying that while much is unknown about the variant, action should be taken now…

title: Appeals Court Upholds Block on Biden’s Vaccine Mandate for Employers
content: A federal court declared that the rule “grossly exceeds” the authority of the occupational safety agency that issued it. Here’s the latest on Covid-19.

title: Facebook deletes 500 accounts tied to fake Swiss expert
content: The accounts amplified claims that the US was meddling in the search for the origins of Covid-19.

title: Singapore to End Free Covid Care for Those ‘Unvaccinated by Choice’
content: Charging Covid patients who had the option to be inoculated will “send this important signal,” the country’s health minister said. Officials at a Vermont college blame Halloween parties for a coronavirus outbreak.

title: Russia reports record daily COVID-19 deaths - Reuters
content: Russia on Saturday reported a new record one-day death toll of 1,241 from COVID-19 as well as 39,256 new coronavirus cases in the last 24 hours.

title: Russia's daily COVID-19 deaths hit new record high - Reuters
content: Russia on Thursday reported 1,251 coronavirus-related deaths in the last 24 hours, an all-time record high that follows a surge in cases.

title: Sabalenka says she got vaccinated after contracting COVID-19 - Reuters
content: World number two Aryna Sabalenka said she got vaccinated against COVID-19 after having to miss last month's Indian Wells tournament because she contracted the novel coronavirus.

title: U.S. Senate Votes to Block President Biden's Vaccine Mandate in Symbolic Win for Covid-19
content: The U.S. Senate voted late Wednesday to block President Joe Biden’s proposed covid-19 vaccine mandate for private businesses, a move that’s largely seen as symbolic since the Democratic-controlled House of Representatives is unlikely to take up the issue and …

title: Denmark reports record daily COVID-19 infection numbers - Reuters
content: Denmark reported a record number of new daily coronavirus infections on Wednesday, data from the country's Serum Institute showed.

title: Germany's COVID-19 situation is dramatic: Merkel - Reuters
content: Germany's coronavirus situation is dramatic, Chancellor Angela Merkel said on Wednesday (November 17), calling for a push to distribute booster shots faster and appealing to those sceptical of vaccination to change their minds.

title: Austria orders non-vaccinated people into COVID-19 lockdown - Reuters
content: Austria is placing millions of people not fully vaccinated against the coronavirus in lockdown as of Monday to deal with a surge in infections to record levels, Chancellor Alexander Schallenberg said on Sunday.

title: Russia's daily COVID-19 deaths close to record high - Reuters
content: Russia on Monday reported 1,211 deaths from COVID-19 in the last 24 hours, close to an all-time high of 1,241 reported last week, as well as 38,420 new coronavirus cases.

title: Germany reports another COVID-19 record: 50196 new cases - Reuters
content: Germany reported a record 50,196 new cases of coronavirus on Thursday, the fourth day in a row it has posted a fresh daily high, as a wave of COVID-19 infections sweeps the country.

title: Bulgaria's daily COVID-19 deaths rise to record high - Reuters
content: Bulgaria reported a record number of daily coronavirus deaths on Tuesday as the European Union's least vaccinated country grapples with a fourth wave of the pandemic, official data showed on Tuesday.
